title.narrative: Tamil Nadu and Puducherry Coastal Disaster Risk Reduction Project

description.narrative: Increasing the resilience of coastal communities in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry, to a range of hydro-meteorological and geophysical hazards along with improving project implementing entities’ capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible crisis or emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance, Republic of India
Project Implementation Agency, Department of Revenue and DM, Government of Puducherry
Tamil Nadu Medical Services Corporation Limited
Tamil Nadu State Disaster Management Agency, Government of Tamil Nadu

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Anti-Corruption | Description :Recipient to ensure that project is carried in accordance with the provisions ofAnti-Corruption Guidelines. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Contingent Emergency Response Mechanism | Description :GoPY and GoTN to prepare a CER OM, nominate and maintaina coordination authority for purpose (and prior to) the implementation of the CER components under their respective Parts of theProjectGoPY and GoTN have (i) determined that an eligible crisis and emergency has occurred and devised activities in responsethereof, and (ii) submitted said activities for the Association concurrence | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Fisheries Livelihoods Support | Description :GoTN to prepare and adopt some guidelines and selection criteriafor the determination of eligible beneficiaries for the distribution provision of in-kind grants (low-cost communication equipment)| Due Date :01-Jul-2015

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements – Consultancy Contracts and MOU | Description :• GoPY to select a Project ManagementConsultant to assist the PIA with project implementation. GoPY to maintain a firm of chartered accountants in order to carry outtheannual Financial Statements for the Project GoTN to maintain the firm of chartered accountants in order to carry outsemi-annual internal audits and the assessment of the internal control protocols. | Due Date :31-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements – Implementation Units | Description :GoPY to maintain a Governing Body of PIA(former empowered committee), the PIA, and an implementation unit in the PWD for purposes of implementing the Project. GoTN tomaintain a state level Steering Committee, an Empowered Committee, a Project Management Unit (within OCRA) and projectimplementation units in the line agencies and departments (RD&PRD, PWD, DOF, TANGEDCO, SMA and DOEF) | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Management Information System for GoPY | Description :GoPY to establish a similar mechanism (includingprocurement modules) | Due Date :28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Management Information System for GoTN | Description :GoTN to maintain a MIS and update it with a procurementmodule including a grievance complaint mechanism and procurement documentation, record keeping systems including disclosure in afree website. | Due Date :28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Documents | Description :GoPY to implement its respective Part of the Project in accordance with its OM,Guidelines for the Selection of Beneficiaries, and the safeguard documents (ESMF, EMPs and RAPs –if applicable).GoTN to implementits respective Part of the Project in accordance with the OM, the Guidelines for the Selection of Beneficiaries, constructionguidelines and the safeguard documents | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Resilient Electrical Network | Description :GoTN to enter into a written agreement with TANGECDO for theimplementation of the resilient electrical network components (underground cable installation) under terms and conditionsacceptable to the Association | Due Date :30-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Resilient Housing | Description :GoTN shall get reimbursed relocation support expenditures in respect of housesthat have been substantially completed and handed over to the respective owner. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards 1 | Description :GoPY and GoTN to carry out the Project in accordance with the respective ESMF andEMPs. GoPY and GoTN shall invite bids for civil works once the environmental and social assessment of such works have been carriedout in accordance with the respective ESMF | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards 2 | Description :No works shall commence until all necessary government permits and clearance shallhave been obtained, and any conditions therefor have been complied withGoPY and GoTN to maintain monitoring and evaluationprotocols to assess compliance with the safeguard documents/requirements, and produce quarterly reports | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Safeguards 3 | Description :GoPY and GoTN to finance any compensation for resettlement and/or rehabilitation outof its own resources | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Sub-projects that are expected to have a mechanism for post-completion operation
Percentage of habitations with access to community managed emergency shelter
Sub-projects with post-project community engagement or O&M arrangements (%)
Percentage of villages having access to fishing related restored linkages/ infrastructure

Increased community resilience and preparedness in coastal areas
Percentage of coastal area with electrical cabling transferred underground
